title: Privacy Policy
summary:
As part of delivering our services, Numispark processes personal data about you.

We collect these data for strictly limited purposes:
- Handling inquiries submitted via the contact form on numispark.com
- Processing job applications received through the site
- Analyzing website traffic on numispark.com
- Tracking how visitors navigate our site
- Preventing fraud
- Providing our software development and IT services
- Managing client relationships and projects

All processing of your personal data by Numispark is based on a legal ground that depends on the type of processing.

Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory; without them, we cannot provide the full range of services.

We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the stated purposes, after which we delete or anonymize it.

We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational measures to keep your data secure.

Your data are stored in databases within the European Union and in the United States (via our service providers). If any transfer outside the EU occurs, we ensure it complies with applicable regulations.

You have various rights regarding your personal data (right of access, rectification, objection, erasure, portability). To exercise these rights, simply send your request to: [email to be completed].

sections.title: 2. What personal data do we process and when is it collected?

content.title: 2.1. Data you provide directly
content.content:
When you use our services, we may ask you to provide:
- First and last name
- Company name
- Your job title
- Email address
- Postal address
- Phone number
- CV details (uploaded file)
- Project-related documents (uploaded files)
- Software requirements
- Billing information

We collect these details when you submit inquiries, apply for jobs, or request services via our website.

content.title: 2.2. Data we collect automatically
content.content:
When you browse our website, we also collect without direct input:
- IP address
- Cookies
- Browser language
- Operating system
- Browser type
- Pages viewed
- Time spent on site
- Geolocation data (country)

sections.title: 3. Why does Numispark process my data?
sections.content:
We process your personal data only to:
- Respond to contact form inquiries
- Process job applications
- Analyze website traffic and user paths
- Prevent fraud
- Deliver software and IT services
- Operate and maintain our solutions
- Manage client relationships and projects
- Prepare quotes and invoices
- Comply with legal obligations

We never use your data for other purposes without prior notice and, if required, your consent.

sections.title: 4. What are the legal grounds for processing?
sections.content:
Each processing activity is based on one of the following:
- Performance of a contract with you
- Your explicit consent
- Numispark’s legitimate interest (e.g., service improvement and fraud prevention)
- Compliance with a legal obligation

sections.title: 5. Is providing my data mandatory?
sections.content: Certain data are essential for delivering our services (e.g., project requests, quote generation). Mandatory fields are marked with an asterisk “*”. Without these, we cannot process your request.

sections.title: 6. How do I manage my cookie preferences?

content.title: 6.1. What are cookies?
content.content: Cookies are small text files that help us recognize your device and personalize our services.

content.title: 6.2. Which cookies do we use?
content.content:
**Essential cookies:** Required for site functionality.

**Analytical cookies (Google Analytics):** Help us understand site usage anonymously.

content.title: 6.3. Google Analytics
content.content: We use Google Analytics by Google Inc. to analyze site usage. Data generated by these cookies (including your IP address) are transferred to and stored in the USA, where Google uses them to evaluate site activity and provide related services.

content.title: 6.4. Cookie management
content.content:
You can configure your browser to block or alert you about cookies. Disabling cookies may affect site functionality.

- Chrome: https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95647?hl=en
- Firefox: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/enable-and-disable-cookies-website-preferences
- Safari: https://support.apple.com/guide/safari/manage-cookies-and-website-data-sfri11471/mac
- Edge: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/4027947/microsoft-edge-delete-cookies

sections.title: 7. How long do we keep your data?
sections.content:
We retain your personal data only as long as necessary:
- **Client records:** 3 years after end of relationship
- **CVs & applications:** 2 years after last contact
- **Billing data:** 10 years (legal requirement)
- **Access logs:** 1 year
- **Google Analytics cookies:** up to 26 months

Afterward, data are deleted or anonymized.

sections.title: 8. Is my data secure?
sections.content:
We take data security seriously, using measures such as:
- Encryption of sensitive data
- Restricted access controls
- Strong authentication
- Regular, secure backups
- Staff training on data protection

sections.title: 9. Where is my data stored?
sections.content: Your data reside in databases within the EU and in the USA (via our providers). Any transfers outside the EU comply with GDPR requirements.

sections.title: 11. What are my rights?
sections.content:
You have the right to:
- **Access** your data
- **Rectify** inaccuracies
- **Erase** your data
- **Object** to processing
- **Restrict** processing
- **Portability** of your data
- **Withdraw** consent

To exercise these rights, email us at: [email to be completed]
We will respond within one month (plus up to two more months for complex requests).

**CNIL complaint**
If you have a dispute, you may lodge a complaint with the French data protection authority: www.cnil.fr

sections.title: 12. Changes to this policy
sections.content: Numispark may update this privacy policy at any time. We will publish changes on our website and notify you by email at least 30 days before they take effect. If you disagree, you may request deletion of your data.
